A.headline: Your Path to Premium Websites
A.description: {name}, your quiz revealed exactly what's holding you back. Logiaweb is the step-by-step course designed to fix it.
A.offerDescription: A step-by-step course that teaches you to build premium websites using AI tools and no-code platforms.

included.title: Video Lessons

included.title: Templates & Prompts
included.description: Ready-to-use assets that accelerate your learning

included.title: Private Community

C.headline: Your Asset Generation Engine
C.description: {name}, your quiz revealed exactly what's slowing you down. Limora is the AI-powered asset engine designed to fix it.
